review: I like everything about my Amazon Fire TV except that it has no on/off feature. I solved this by plugging it into a surge protector along with the TV, DVD, XBOX, etc. and turning them all off from there. Fire TV is easy to set up and easy and fun to use. I'm sure I have just scratched the surface of its entertainment potential. Great job Amazon.
